author: Grizz1
title: Kerry: Climate change made the Syrian civil war far worse
text: Location: OZ Posts: 1,126 this was the moment when the rise of the oceans began to slow and our planet began to heal; Barak Obama We are the ones we've been waiting for. Barak Obama “I think that I’m a better speechwriter than my speechwriters. I know more about policies on any particular issue than my policy directors. And I’ll tell you right now that I’m gonna think I’m a better political director than my political director.” Barak Obama We get it boy you are a god, a legend in your own mind....this boy idolizes himself....and the Left worships him.
